title: Tell the Truth
description: Reveal an embarrassing truth about yourself.

title: Do a Dare
description: Perform a silly dance for 30 seconds.

title: Group Toast
description: Everyone raises a drink and says one thing they like about the person on their left.

title: Minute Challenge
description: Complete a small challenge (stack 5 coins) within 60 seconds or take a sip.

title: Social Question
description: Ask someone to share the worst date they ever had.

title: Wildcard
description: Pick a rule that everyone must follow for the next 2 rounds.

title: Pair Up
description: Choose a partner and exchange a funny story about each other.
